content.text: Match ends, Sevilla 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
Second Half ends, Sevilla 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0.
Attempt saved. Ibrahima Traoré (Borussia Mönchengladbach) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Julian Korb.
Steven N'Zonzi (Sevilla) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Steven N'Zonzi (Sevilla).
Josip Drmic (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Goal!  Sevilla 3, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Yevhen Konoplyanka (Sevilla) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Michael Krohn-Dehli following a corner.
Substitution, Sevilla. Yevhen Konoplyanka replaces Reyes.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Josip Drmic replaces Raffael.
Corner,  Sevilla. Conceded by Yann Sommer.
Attempt saved. Ciro Immobile (Sevilla) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Reyes with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Michael Krohn-Dehli (Sevilla) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Reyes (Sevilla) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Reyes (Sevilla).
Attempt blocked. Reyes (Sevilla) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Sevilla. Michael Krohn-Dehli replaces Éver Banega.
Mahmoud Dahoud (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Éver Banega (Sevilla).
Julian Korb (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ciro Immobile (Sevilla).
Attempt blocked. Thorgan Hazard (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Raffael.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Nico Schulz replaces André Hahn.
Offside, Sevilla. Kolo tries a through ball, but Ciro Immobile is caught offside.
Substitution, Sevilla. Ciro Immobile replaces Kevin Gameiro.
Foul by Coke (Sevilla).
Håvard Nordtveit (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Borussia Mönchengladbach. Mahmoud Dahoud replaces Lars Stindl.
Goal!  Sevilla 2, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Éver Banega (Sevilla) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty Sevilla. Kevin Gameiro draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Tony Jantschke (Borussia Mönchengladbach) after a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt missed. Reyes (Sevilla) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Steven N'Zonzi.
Attempt blocked. Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Grzegorz Krychowiak (Sevilla).
André Hahn (Borussia Mönchengladbach) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, Sevilla. Marco Andreolli tries a through ball, but Kevin Gameiro is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Éver Banega (Sevilla) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Coke with a cross.
Attempt saved. Éver Banega (Sevilla) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Foul by Raffael (Borussia Mönchengladbach).
Reyes (Sevilla) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Sevilla 1, Borussia Mönchengladbach 0. Kevin Gameiro (Sevilla) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
